Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I hope Captain Flaxel and the squad are
all right...
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Captain Flaxel's squad of the monster-
control crew <clr:ffff>is executing an operation up
ahead! <sp:5:0:0>Please take care as you approach.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That was left behind because maintenance
wasn't completed on it by the time the
strike began.
The captain left me with clear ordersâ€”<sp:5:0:0>
"Just give it to whoever wants it!"<sp:5:0:0> So if
you'd like it, it's yours.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I really hope Captain Flaxel and the squad
make it through all right...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Captain Flaxel's monster-control-crew
squad <clr:ffff>is executing a strike just nearby!
<sp:5:0:0>Careful not to get caught up in it.
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Captain Flaxel recaptured that weapon.
You should have seen the way the
monster was swinging it around.
"As long as it's out of monster hands,<sp:5:0:0>
I don't care who takes it!"<sp:5:0:0> Those were
her orders, so it's yours if you want it!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, hey. <sp:5:0:0>Things are pretty dicey ahead.
<clr:0000>Captain Flaxel's monster-control-crew
squad<clr:ffff> is executing an operation there.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>She's up against pirates... <sp:5:1:0>I just hope the
whole squad makes it back safely.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This area is dangerous. <clr:0000>Captain Flaxel's
squad of the monster-control crew <clr:ffff>is
executing a strike nearby.
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>They're up against monsters that built a
huge fort... <sp:5:1:0>I just hope the captain and
crew don't get hurt during the strike.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's a pirate ship moored on the <clr:0000>shore
of Menoat River to the west<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But never fear! The monster-control crew
is on their way to take them out.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I made a bunch of food while keeping an
eye on things here. Here, have a little!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Some monsters built a <clr:0000>fort <clr:ffff>near here and
have been terrorizing the area ever since.<sp:0:4:0>But Captain Flaxel and squad three are on
the case!
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Why am I not out there with them?<sp:5:1:0>
Because I'm here to keep them fed!
I'm a cook!
In fact, I just threw together a new recipe
while I was holding down the fort.<sp:5:0:0> Here,
give it a try!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Oh, me? I'm the cook assigned to Captain
Flaxel's squad. I'm watching over this
camp while they're away!
I've also been trying out some new
recipes in the meantime. <sp:5:0:0>I'd love it
if you gave my latest a try!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>If you're confident in your ability to
swing a sword, you should go <clr:0000>help
Captain Flaxel and the others<clr:ffff>!
Talk_1001_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You're back? At this hour?<sp:5:1:0> Good morning,
early riser!
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>It's a big fort, so the squad's probably in
for a rough fight. I wish they had a <clr:0000>really
confident fighter to help them<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Oh, scratch that. <sp:5:1:0>You've already got so
many dishes in your pouch, you can't
carry even one more.<sp:5:0:0> Darn.
Talk_1001_01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Good to see you again!<sp:5:1:0> I'm kind of
surprised you're not asleep right now.
Talk_1001_01_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, hello.<sp:5:1:0> Not exactly the most relaxing
weather today, is it?
Talk_1001_01_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, hi there!<sp:5:1:0> It sure is chilly around here,
isn't it?
Talk_1001_01_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Brrr... <sp:5:1:0>I'd offer you a better greeting, but
I think I'd freeze if I stepped away from
the fire.
